name: Time Reverse - Clicker
description:
Game made for the Clicker Jam

Humanity now resides on Mars, but you must use a clock to travel back in time to caveman era. 

Unlock cards as you travel back in time through some important periods of Humankind's history!

What I used to help me:

  • Krita: GNU v2 Licence
  • Audacity: GNU v3 Licence
  • Godot: MIT Licence
  • LMMS: GNU v2 Licence

All assets were made by me; all sounds were made by me; and all code was made by me

However, the font I used for the game and this page is from Google Fonts. Linked here:

Delicious Handrawn - Google Fonts
